Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Ave/Harlem
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Oak Park, Division, Ridgeland, and North Avenue due to, street blockage near North Ave/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Oak Park, Division, Ridgeland, and North Avenue due to, street blockage near North Ave/Harlem.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Perry
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Halsted, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Perry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, State, 111th, Halsted, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Perry.

Allow extra travel time.
